document.full_text: giving a high dose of niacin to people with heart disease who are already taking a cholesterol-lowering statin does nothing more to prevent heart attacks and strokes, u.s. government researchers said on thursday.
document.title: no heart benefit seen in adding niacin to statin
lines_and_colors: giving a high dose of niacin to people with heart disease who are already taking a cholesterol-lowering statin does nothing more to prevent heart attacks and strokes, u.s. government researchers said on thursday.
